name: Back II La Future
description:
The world has become saturated with noise. Return to a time of peace.

I'm new to using Bitsy software. When I realized that its limits were also its greatest strength, I took advantage of mostly the artistic portion of the game. I wanted to add more detail to the game but I found it very time consuming to create it with precision. After, exploring the aspects of Bitsy, I decided to make this game a prototype to the Unity version I will be creating in the near future.

I wanted the game to be modern-based so I began by creating city-like structures and machinery. Once I had my environment, I added key sprites and components into the game that gave it an interactive feel. I didn't have time to extend the game. This prototype is meant to get a feel for what players like.
